How a person is a confirmed ascetic [an4: A mendicant is a practicing trainee
Lives aspiring to the supreme sanctuary
Has not yet been anointed, but is eligible
Has been confirmed in the succession
How a person is a white lotus ascetic (a: A mendicant realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Lives having realized it with their own insight due to the ending of defilements
Does not have direct meditative experience of the eight liberations
How a person is a pink lotus ascetic (a: A mendicant realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Has direct meditative experience of the eight liberations
How a person is an exquisite ascetic of: Usually uses only what they’ve been invited to accept
Usually treats other spiritual practitioners agreeably by way of body, speech, and mind, and rarely disagreeably
Usually presents them with agreeable things, rarely with disagreeable ones
Healthy, so the various unpleasant feelings usually don’t come up
Gets the four absorptions when they want, without trouble or difficulty
Realizes the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
The qualities of the speaker that make h: Usually uses only what he’s been invited to accept
Treats other spiritual practitioners agreeably by way of body, speech, and mind, and rarely disagreeably
Healthy, so the various unpleasant feelings usually don’t come up
Gets the four absorptions when he wants, without trouble or difficulty
Has realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life.
